entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:28 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
